content: Changes will be applied after the confirmation via email.

comment.text: This translation key is used for the confirmation text displayed when a user confirms changing the owner of access rights via email. It will appear in a modal dialog footer to inform the user about the process after confirming.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is not a natural-sounding way to express the original meaning. 'Təsdiqlənmə məktubundan sonra' is overly literal and clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Dəyişikliklər e-poçt təsdiqi aldıqdan sonra tətbiq olunacaq.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'məktubundan' which translates to 'from the letter' is unnecessary and makes the sentence sound awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Dəyişikliklər e-poçt təsdiqi aldıqdan sonra tətbiq olunacaq.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation is a literal translation and sounds slightly unnatural. A more fluent phrasing would improve the user experience.

The translation 'Zmiany zostaną zastosowane po zatwierdzeniu ich drogą mailową' is a bit literal and less natural. 'zatwierdzeniu ich drogą mailową' sounds awkward. A more natural phrasing would convey the same meaning in a more fluent way.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Zmiany zostaną zastosowane po potwierdzeniu przez e-mail.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Romanian translation 'Modificările vor fi aplicate după confirmarea e-mailului' is a literal translation and sounds unnatural. A more natural phrasing would emphasize that the user needs to confirm the change.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Modificările vor fi aplicate după confirmarea ta prin e-mail.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Zmeny sa vykonajú po potvrdení e-mailu' is a literal translation and doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'Changes will be applied after confirmation via email.' It implies confirming the email itself rather than confirming the changes.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Zmeny sa prevezmú po potvrdení e-mailom.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Spremembe bodo uporabljene po potrditvi po e-mailu' is technically correct but sounds unnatural. A more natural phrasing would be 'Spremembe se bodo začele veljati po potrditvi po e-pošti.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Spremembe se bodo začele veljati po potrditvi po e-pošti.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses 'e-mailu' which is a slightly older form. Modern Slovenian prefers 'e-pošti'.

The translation 'Промене ће бити аплициране након конфирмације путем емаил-а' is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'Changes will be applied after the confirmation via email.' The word 'аплициране' (applied) is technically correct, but sounds formal and somewhat awkward in this context. 'емаил-а' is also a transliteration and not a standard Serbian term.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Промене ће бити примењене након потврде путем е-маила.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'емаил-а' is a transliteration and not a standard Serbian term. It should be 'е-маила'.

The translation "Promene će biti aplicirane nakon konfirmacije putem email-a." is a literal translation and sounds unnatural in Serbian.  'Aplicirane' is awkward in this context. A more natural phrasing would be 'Promene će biti izvršene nakon potvrde putem email-a.' or 'Promene će se primeniti nakon potvrde putem email-a.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Promene će biti izvršene nakon potvrde putem email-a.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Turkish translation implies the changes *have already* been confirmed via email. The English text states the confirmation *will* occur via email.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Değişiklikler, e-posta yoluyla onaylandıktan sonra uygulanacaktır.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "通过邮件确认后将应用变更" is a literal translation but sounds somewhat unnatural in Chinese. A more natural phrasing would convey the meaning more clearly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 可以通过邮件确认后变更生效 (Kěyǐ tōngguò yóujiàn quèrèn hòu biàngēng shēngxiào).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The original English conveys that changes will be applied *after* confirmation. While the Chinese translation isn't wrong, it doesn't emphasize the sequential order as clearly. A better phrasing might explicitly state 'after confirmation'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 可以通过邮件确认后变更生效 (Kěyǐ tōngguò yóujiàn quèrèn hòu biàngēng shēngxiào).
